name: Genesis Boots
tooltip:
Genesis BootsLevel 60

Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Dominance, 2 Idols of Rebirth, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Silver Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj.  This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Bindings of Dominance
- Idol of Rebirth x 2
- Stone Scarab x 5
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
